TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlPreloadedResolver extends System.Xml.XmlResolver

summary.span: 表示类，其用于通过 DTD 或 XML 流预填充缓存。

span.span: Represents a class that is used to prepopulate the cache with DTDs or XML streams.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不需要自动调用网络或不可能，则使用 类型作为解析程序。The type is used as a resolver when automatic calls to the network are not desired or are not possible. 例如，此类型可用于加载缓存的外部 Dtd。For example, this type can be used for loading cached external DTDs. 或者，你可以使用 预加载在 XHTML 1.0 中定义的已知 Dtd。Or, you might use to preload well-known DTDs that are defined in XHTML 1.0. 预加载已知的 Dtd 不会启动任何网络连接，因为这些 Dtd 已经嵌入到 Utils 程序集中。Preloading well-known DTDs does not start any network connections because these DTDs are already embedded in the System.Xml.Utils assembly. 目前 包含在 XHTML 1.0 和 RSS 0.91 中定义的 Dtd。Currently, includes the DTDs that are defined in XHTML 1.0 and RSS 0.91.

span.span: A or object that corresponds to the actual source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将首先尝试在其预加载数据的存储中查找资源。The will first try to look up the resource in its store of preloaded data. 如果找不到，它将调用回退解析程序的 `GetEntity` 方法。If it cannot find it, it will call the fallback resolver's `GetEntity` method. 如果 构造函数中未提供回退解析程序，则会引发异常。If no fallback resolver was provided in the constructor, an exception is thrown.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 无法解析 中传递的 URI。

span.span: Cannot resolve URI passed in .
-or-
is not of a supported type.
